org.opt4j.core

Interface Genotype

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ListGenotype<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryString, BooleanGenotype, BooleanMapGenotype, CompositeGenotype, DoubleGenotype, DoubleMapGenotype, DoubleString, IntegerGenotype, IntegerMapGenotype, PermutationGenotype, SATGenotype, SelectGenotype, SelectMapGenotype

    public interface Genotype
    The Genotype represents a marker interface. A Genotype represents the genetic encoding of a solution of the optimization problem. Thus, a Genotype can be decoded to a phenotype with an appropriate Decoder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
